price: I oni ugledni među njima krenuše: "Idite, nastavite i ustrajte uz božanstva svoja! Uistinu, to je nešto što se hoće!
arabic: وَٱنطَلَقَ ٱلۡمَلَأُ مِنۡهُمۡ أَنِ ٱمۡشُواْ وَٱصۡبِرُواْ عَلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِكُمۡۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَيۡءٞ يُرَادُ

version.title: Bosnian Translation - Muhammad Mihanovich
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Muhammad Mihanovich, printed in 2013. some referred verses corrected by Supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation, and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-inṭalaqa al-mala-u min'hum ani im'shū wa-iṣ'birū ʿalā ālihatikum inna hādhā lashayon yurādu
